title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

CNN reinstates Jeffrey Toobin, but warns him: No more jerking around. U.S. Military totally corrupted by liberalism. Generals rebuke Biden: China, Not Climate change poses the biggest threat to America. Victor Davis Hanson: The left is in "prolonged adolescence." All the lies the media has told us over the last year are being exposed: from Trump in Lafayette Park, to hydroxychloroquine, to the lockdowns. Fauci says when you attack HIM, you are attacking science. Rubio responds to Fauci. Biden's massive spending is causing inflation, now some Republicans want to work with Biden on new "infrastructure spending"? MLB's wokeness. America's cities are dangerous places to go again. Buckhead area of Atlanta wants to secede, create their own police force.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

The same people who want to make your neighborhoods less safe, also want to take away your ability to defend yourself. Rush on how the global warming hoax embodies everything liberals want to accomplish rolled up into one issue. Open Line Friday callers. Rush on the left's attack on "whiteness." Caller on the truth about America and slavery. Tucker Carlson on Fed memo warning against "offensive" terms and pronouns. Rush on Tom Brokaw and self-loathing liberals.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

CDC emergency meeting on vaccine side effects on teens. Rush on America First, the meaning of Thanksgiving, the signers of the Declaration of Independence. Road Trip with Rush: Dexys Midnight Runners. Open Line Friday callers. Sean Hannity excerpt from podcast series: Rush Limbaugh: The Man Behind the Golden EIB Microphone. Jeffrey Toobin returns to CNN. Rush on Toobin. EIB High Note. Jason's talk with Rod Carew at Twins game. Singer steps back and lets crowd sing the national anthem at NHL playoff game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
